message.body: "The kernel is a computer program that constitutes the central core of a computer's operating system." [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kernel_%28operating_system%29)
I read somewhere that Linux adoption has skyrocketed since the NSA disclosures that showed Microsoft's willingness to cooperate with the NSA.
Yeah, definitely. It is incredible how far Android has come in just ~7 years.
